description:
The Repack™ LR 4 50 oz belt is the best option for riders who need more than a water bottle, but don't want the bulk of a full backpack. Increase mobility and lowers your center of gravity while still carrying all the essentials.

  • 1.5L CRUX™ hydration reservoir
  • Compression straps cinch the reservoir to your back for a stable and secure fit
  • Zippered pocket keeps your essentials secure and accessible
  • Magnetic Tube Trap keeps drink tube in place
  • Reflective details for enhanced visibility
name: CamelBak Repack Lr 4 Hydration Pack - Unisex
